default.description: Explore Computer Networks lab assignments with LAN/WAN setup, subnetting, routing protocols, socket programming, and real-world simulations using Packet Tracer and Wireshark.

questions.question: Demonstrate the different types of topologies and types of transmission media using a Packet Tracer tool.
questions.title: Network Topologies and Transmission Media using Packet Tracer

questions.question: Use packet Tracer tool for configuration of 3 router networks using one of the following protocols RIP.
questions.title: RIP Routing Protocol Configuration with Packet Tracer

questions.question: Write a program to demonstrate Sub-netting and calculate subnet masks for different IP address classes.
questions.title: Subnetting Program with Subnet Mask Calculation

questions.question: Write a program to implement Link State or Distance Vector routing protocol to determine the optimal path for data transmission.
questions.title: Routing Protocols: Link State and Distance Vector Implementation

questions.question: Implement socket programming using C/C++/Java for the following: a) TCP Client and TCP Server. b) UDP Client and UDP Server
questions.title: TCP and UDP Socket Programming

questions.question: Write a program using TCP socket for a wired network to perform the following tasks: 1) Say Hello to each other. 2) Transfer a file.
questions.title: TCP Socket Programming - Hello and File Transfer

questions.question: Write a program using UDP Sockets to enable file transfer (Script, Text, Audio, and Video â€“ one file each) between two machines.
questions.title: UDP Socket Programming for File Transfer

questions.question: Study and Analyze the performance of HTTP, HTTPS and FTP protocol using Packet tracer tool.
questions.title: HTTP, HTTPS and FTP Protocol Performance Analysis

questions.question: To study the SSL protocol by capturing the packets using Wireshark tool while visiting any SSL secured website (banking, e-commerce etc.).
questions.title: SSL Protocol Analysis using Wireshark

questions.question: Write a program for DNS lookup. Given an IP address input, it should return URL and vice versa.
questions.title: DNS Lookup Program - IP to URL and URL to IP
